atrai.core

Class TreeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • atrai.core.TreeBuilder

  • public class TreeBuilder
extends Object
    A utility class for incrementally building a tree
    Author:
    Koushik Sen, Alex Reinking

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TreeBuilder()
      Create a new tree builder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLeaf(Object leaf)
      Add a leaf to the children of the current node.
      void addLocation(int counter, Location location)
      Add a source location to the list
      void beginSubTree()
      Begin creating a subtree rooted at the current position.
      void endSubTree()
      Finish the subtree and insert it to the list of children of the current node when the corresponding beginSubTree() method was called
      ArrayList<Location> getLocations() 
      Object getTree()
      Once the tree is finished (no subtrees are being built), finalize the tree and return it.
      void reset()
      Clear the tree and reset the builder to the initial state

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreeBuilder

        public TreeBuilder()
        Create a new tree builder

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Clear the tree and reset the builder to the initial state

      • beginSubTree

        public void beginSubTree()
        Begin creating a subtree rooted at the current position. Must be closed by a corresponding call to endSubTree()

      • endSubTree

        public void endSubTree()
        Finish the subtree and insert it to the list of children of the current node when the corresponding beginSubTree() method was called

      • addLeaf

        public void addLeaf(Object leaf)
        Add a leaf to the children of the current node.
        Parameters:
        leaf - the leaf to add

      • getTree

        public Object getTree()
        Once the tree is finished (no subtrees are being built), finalize the tree and return it.
        Returns:
        the tree

      • addLocation

        public void addLocation(int counter,
                        Location location)
        Add a source location to the list
        Parameters:
        counter - the index in the sequence of positions (ie. the id of the tree node)
        location - the location to add

      • getLocations

        public ArrayList<Location> getLocations()
